name: Avatar The Last Airbender - Fan Game
name_original: Avatar The Last Airbender - Fan Game
description:
Hey everyone, I'm Rog and I love Avatar - The Last Airbender, I also happen to be a game developer (sort of), I'm on this passion project to make a cool strategic avatar bending game. I studied the Earthbending style and I tried to mix the poses on my own way to create some cool Earthbending movements. 

Of course, everything is a really rough right now, I just made a local mp to test out how the game flows, since I don't have much time due to work, I couldn't get more done.

If you want me to keep working on this game, maybe bring some A.I and other bending style in the future, donate and help me out, I'm willing to stop taking commissions to  focus on developing this fan game!

Please let me know any bugs you guys find and if you have any feedback, feel free to comment here, or you can just talk to me on my Discord: https://discord.gg/ADVbTEmwfC

Next Update (probably this weekend):

-Polish close combat

-Add more bending techniques (1 or 2 maybe)

-Background work

-Destructible scenario (houses, rocks, trees)

CONTROLS:

=GAMEPAD=

-Directional: Move

-X = Punch -B = Kick -A = Jump

-LT,LB(hold)= Poses

-RT,RB(hold) + Directional= Bend movements

=KEYBOARD - P1=

Arrows - Move

Numpad(6,9,4,7)= Poses 

Numpad(6,9,4,7) + Arrows= Bend movements

Numpad(1) = Punch

 Numpad(2) = Kick 

=Keyboard - P2=

W,A,S,D - Move

J,U,H,Y= Poses 

J,U,H,Y + W,A,S,D= Bend Movements

V = Punch

 B = Kick
